relation.text: 1787 My dear Friend ! Where are you , what is become
wrote me a few lines , weeks
begin n i n g of May
staid almost a fortnig ht & here I am now
tell me my dear what are your Plans for this Summer
remain here till the 5 th of September
return for two fortnights , one about the end of September
think my dear Friend that you we have been here six years
